$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: Reference to JSON schema of this config

themesConfig.title: QWC2 themes configuration
themesConfig.description: Corresponds to contents of standalone QWC2 themesConfig.json

config_db_url.description: Connection URL for configuration database. Example: postgresql:///?service=qwc_configdb

default_qgis_server_url.description: Default QGIS Server URL for OGC requests. Example: http://qwc-qgis-server/ows/

qgis_projects_base_dir.description: Base path for QGIS projects. Example: /data

qgis_projects_scan_base_dir.description: Path for QGIS projects, which should be automatically detected. Must be a subdir qgis_projects_base_dir. Example: /data/scan

qgis_projects_gen_base_dir.description: Path for generated QGIS projects, result of preprocessing. Must be a subdir of qgis_projects_base_dir. Can be the same as qgis_projects_scan_base_dir, in which case the theme autodetection will apply to generated QGIS projects. Example: /data/gen

permissions_default_allow.description: Set whether resources are permitted or restricted by default. Example: true

validate_schema.description: Validate configuration against schema. Example: true

config_path.description: Target path for generated service configs and permissions, if not set by $OUTPUT_CONFIG_PATH. Example: /config-out

qwc2_base_dir.description: Path to the QWC2 directory, which will be used to autodetect thumbnails. If qgis_projects_scan_base_dir is not set, then this option will be ignored. Example /qwc2

skip_print_layer_groups.description: Skip group layers containing print layers

split_categorized_layers.description: Set to true to activate the categorize groups funcitonality

autogen_keyvaltable_datasets.description: Whether to automatically generate data service datasets used for key-value relationships without requiring corresponding data resources to be created. Warning: this will expose the key and value fields of the key-value table as world readable. Default: false

services.title: Service configs
services.description: Service specific config options for generating their service configs

common_service.description: Generator config for a QWC service

config.description: QWC service config options (cf. its JSON schema). This is copied unmodified to the service config.

generator_config.description: Additional config for generating MapViewer resources

qwc2_config.description: Additional config for QWC2 application configuration

qwc2_config_file.description: Path to QWC2 config.json file. Example: /qwc2/config.json

qwc2_index_file.description: Path to QWC2 index.html file. Example: /qwc2/index.html

config.description: Map Viewer config options (cf. JSON schema qwc-map-viewer.json). This is copied unmodified to the service config.

generator_config.description: Additional config for generating OGC service resources

service.description: Default public base URL for OnlineResources

feature_info.description: Public base URL for FeatureInfo OnlineResources

legend.description: Public base URL for Legend OnlineResources

config.description: OGC service config options (cf. JSON schema qwc-ogc-service.json). This is copied unmodified to the service config.
